Much smarter ğŸ¤©ï¼š

ğŸ‰ Real support for auto-formatted typesetting, using Swift to call Prettier, much smarter.
ğŸŠ macOS Ventura is fully compatible with completion, sorting ability is better, title support '/', tab width becomes 2.
ğŸ™Š Fix problems such as underlining in quick sweep, cursor position when formatting, highlighting of titles between code blocks, code display in preview mode, preview not changing when switching between automatic appearance modes, preview effect optimization, indentation of list todoList display, etc. Thanks to shell-Rainingã€jievinceã€ç†é”…é”… to help catch bugs.

More stable ğŸ™ï¼š

ğŸ˜µ Fix the problem of certificate expiration, and fix the problem of reinstallation failure of some models compared with version 1.4.3.

ğŸ­ Start to adapt the MacOS Ventura version, basically almost.
